title: TO_VARIANT | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Converts any value to a VARIANT value or NULL (if input is NULL).
An expression of any data type.

The TO_VARIANT function cannot be used directly in an INSERT statement.
Instead, use INSERT INTO ... SELECT.... The Examples section
shows how to do this.

Use TO_VARIANT and PARSE_JSON to insert VARIANT values into a table. The PARSE_JSON function
returns a VARIANT value.
